name: El Rey del Mundo - 2022 Edicion Regional - Grand Marshall - Exclusivo Balkani
additionalNotes: In 1882, and under the aegis of Antonio Allones, who had started producing Habanos over 30 years in Havana, it was decided to launch a brand of premium quality and price, with a name that quickly became known for its great dose of pretense: “The King of the World”.This success lives on to this day in a selected range of Habanos renowned for its light to medium flavour and consistency by the most demanding smokers.It is a brand that it has been used a lot in regional editions. All of the Habanos are made “Totalmente a Mano con Tripa Larga”- Totally Handmade with Long Filler” with filler and wrapper leaves coming from the zone of the Region in Cuba.
